doc:
William Austin (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Austin_(actor) 0 William Austin (12 June 1884 – 15 June 1975) was an English character actor. He was the first actor to play Alfred in a Batman adaptation. William_Austin ( 12_June_1884 – 15_June_1975 ) was an_English_character_actor . He was the_first_actor to_play Alfred in a_Batman_adaptation .
